title: Database
description: Take control of your application’s data layer by learning SQL, and take NoSQL for a spin if you’re feeling non-relational.

courses.descriptionCourse: Discover how to manipulate relational database systems using SQL. In these courses, you’ll learn how to create a database and work with data inside of it, as well as best practices for modeling data in your apps.

course.courseDescription: Learn basic database manipulation with SQL.
Move beyond the basics and learn the most powerful features of relational databases.
